ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Good point, get a pair of EBWs instead :)
ygData.messageBody:
Good point, get a pair of EBWs instead :)


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Greg Gillan [mailto:ggillan@...]
> Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 4:38 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
>
>
> From: Greg Gillan <ggillan@...>
>
> Taunt on the orb is huge, and it goes off a lot. Great weapon
> when there's
> no enchanter around though.
>
>
> Elwyn
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
> Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 5:08 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
>
> Early bardic life a procing weapon is good. I'm told that in a
> bard's late
> life you don't want the additional taunt of a proc. At level 45 I'm duel
> wielding Ykesha's or a Ykesha and a Kisch. Every 50th level bard I know
> tells me that what I'm really going to want short of planes weapons is an
> orb or duel EBWs so I can still damage without the taunt. We'll see :)
>
>
>
